site_name: Phase 1 Of The South Acton Estate Regeneration Masterplan, Land Adj To Bridge Road,
description: Details of the Final Certificates under the Code for Sustainable Homes accreditation pursuant to condition 28 of planning permission P/2010/4201 dated 21/03/2011 (as amended by P/2011/3381 dated 07/12/2011) for Redevelopment of the vacant site formerly occupied by Bollo Court and Kipling Tower, with a new perimeter block building (3 to 9 storeys) containing 167 new flats and houses (comprised of 57 x one-bedroom, 83 x two-bedroom, 19 x three-bedroom flats and 8 x four-bedroom houses) together with an energy centre, communal and private gardens, 75 car parking bays including 53 on-site car parking bays (including 10 disabled bays) within the undercroft of the building, and 22 on-street car parking bays (15 bays provided along the western side of All Saints Road, including 2 disabled bays, and 7 spaces provided as part of the proposed Home Zone to the south including 2 car club spaces), refuse, recycling and bicycle storage.
